title: [LOVE] Ep. 95: Toxic Relationships: The Signs to Look Out For w/ Tiffany Louise
description:
How long have you been questioning whether your partner is the right one for you?

This week Ash talks with Tiffany Louise all about the signs of an unhealthy relationship and what steps you can take to build a healthy one.  Tiffany is a speaker, author, and LCSW that coaches people to create their healthiest and happiest connected lives.

Tiffany shares that people are not toxic, patterns are.  Through her years of experience as a therapist and time spent researching, Tiffany reveals what causes people to stay in unhealthy relationships, especially those with unstable partners. 

An unhealthy relationship can look like a lot of different things.  Listen in to hear Tiffany and Ash walk through the key indicators that your relationship may be healthy or not.  Sometimes the signs of an unhealthy or abusive partner can be tricky to identify.  Don’t worry, they offer very specific examples of the four main ways someone can be abusive.

Have you found yourself trying to determine whether you should continue to work on your relationship or walk away?  Or, perhaps you’ve listened to your friend vent for months, or years, about their relationship not moving forward.  Tiffany shares how to know when its time to leave and how to make sure you don’t find yourself in this place again.  This stagnation may be the result of a one-sided relationship or an imbalance in masculine and feminine energy.  So, be sure to stay tuned the whole episode to gain all the juicy advice around these topics!

 

In This Episode, You Will Learn:

  1. Why people stay in unstable relationships and How to know when it is time to leave.
  2. What a love bomb is and how to tell if someone has dropped one on you.
  3. How to balance your masculine and feminine energy to attract the right partner.

 

Resources:

Deeper Dating: How To Drop The Games of Seduction and Discover the Power of Intimacy by Ken Page

 

Where You Can Find Tiffany Louise

Instagram: @tiffany.louise

www.tiffanylouise.com

 

Promotion:

Want to land your dream job? Visit www.youturnpodcast.com/joboffer
